All changes that affect logic must be covered by tests when applicable.

## ğŸ“ Commit Convention
This project follows **Conventional Commits**.

Examples:
- feat(ci): add rust support
- fix(release): handle empty changelog
- chore(docs): update README

## ğŸš€ Release flow
- All releases are automated
- Triggered by merge into `main`
